long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Listen to millions of songs, watch music videos and experience live performances all on Apple Music.

















































Apple Music for Chrome is a lightweight browser extension designed to enhance your experience while using the Apple Music web application. With this extension, you can easily adjust the brightness of the webpage and customize the background color to suit your preferences.

Features:

Brightness Adjustment: Use a convenient slider to increase or decrease the brightness of the Apple Music page, allowing for a more comfortable viewing experience, especially in low-light environments.
Background Color Customization: Choose from a selection of background colors to personalize the appearance of the Apple Music interface. Options include white, pink, green, blue, and gray.
User-Friendly Interface: The extension features a simple and intuitive popup that allows you to make adjustments with ease.
